title: Wizard101 Quest
description: A schema for defining a quest within the world of Wizard101, based on its established lore and mechanics.

questID.description: A unique identifier for the quest.

questTitle.description: The official name of the quest as it would appear to the player.

levelRequirement.description: The suggested player level for undertaking this quest.

world.description: The world in The Spiral where the quest takes place.

questGiver.description: The NPC who assigns the quest to the player.

location.description: The specific area where the NPC is found.

start.description: The initial dialogue from the quest giver when offering the quest.

end.description: The concluding dialogue from the quest giver upon completion.

reminder.description: A brief summary of the current objective, for the quest log.

objectives.description: An ordered list of tasks the player must complete.

description.description: A brief player-facing description of the task (e.g., 'Talk to Sergeant Muldoon').

target.description: The specific person, creature, or object of the objective.

location.description: The area where the objective must be completed.

quantity.description: The number of items to collect or enemies to defeat.

collects.description: The name of the item to be collected from the target.

rewards.description: The rewards granted to the player upon quest completion.

gear.description: A selection of gear items offered as a reward.
